name: Prison Escape (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Prison Escape (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Zoey S.D. and Kenny Z.

Prison Escape is a game that you controls the prisoner and jump the best you can! Use A/D to control left/right, and left click/right click to cast your high pitch sonar/low pitch sonar.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
